description: '''Suomisaundi''' ({{langx|en|"Finnish sound"}}), also known as '''suomisoundi''', '''suomistyge''' or '''spugedelic trance''', is a style of [[psychedelic trance]] that originated in [[Finland]] around the mid-1990s. "Suomisaundi" literally means "Finnish sound" in [[Finnish language|Finnish]]. Suomisaundi's biggest proponents are said to be Tim Thick and his label Thixx'n'Dixx.
